titleStmt.title: A vvilderness of trouble leading to a Canaan of comfort, or, The method and manner of God's dealing with the heirs of heaven in the ministry of the Word wherein is shewed how the Lord brings them into this trouble, supporteth them under it, and delivereth them out of it, so that none finally miscarry / by W. Crompton ...
titleStmt.author: Crompton, William, 1599?-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for J. Robinson ... to be sold by Mich. Hide ...,
